attributes.title: THIS APP SHOULD BE ASHAMED OF ITSELF
attributes.review: I had an open mind while downloading this app, thinking that maybe the interface would be user friendly and would get some understanding to daddy Trump's actions. Instead, I was IMMEDIATELY STRUCK with a popup for possible NOTIFICATIONS?? Blasphemy. I decided that that was an unreasonable reason to give this app a low rating, so I continued to truck further along. There was a big button that said "Enter Mobile Phone", and of course, I want to get presi Trump's text messages, I want to be his confidant, his silly rabbit, and maybe he'll tell me his little cheeto dust feelings. But NO. All that I received was automated text messages about his campaign????? I don't need that!! That was the last straw and this app is the worst. Please do download and leave a terrible review. ü•∞üíû

attributes.title: Cat vomit EVERYWHERE.
attributes.review: I‚Äôll start off by saying I don‚Äôt know who let this orange peel of a president put this app out there. Long story short I had to explain this all the the police and let me tell you that was embarrassing (but the officer understood the situation). One star for an awful experience.
